welcome.title: Welcome to Plan Cascade
welcome.description: Let's set up your development orchestration environment. This wizard will guide you through the essential configuration steps.

mode.title: Choose Your Working Mode
mode.description: Select how you want to use Plan Cascade.

simple.name: Claude Code GUI Mode
simple.description: Simple interface for Claude Code. Just describe your task and let it execute. Best for quick tasks and getting started.

expert.name: Standalone Orchestration Mode
expert.description: Full PRD generation, multi-agent coordination, and execution strategies. Best for complex projects requiring multiple agents.

backend.title: Select LLM Backend
backend.description: Choose the AI provider for code generation.

claudeCode.name: Claude Code (Recommended)
claudeCode.description: Uses your existing Claude Code subscription. No additional API key needed.

claudeApi.name: Claude API
claudeApi.description: Direct Anthropic API access. Requires an API key.

openai.name: OpenAI
openai.description: Use OpenAI GPT models. Requires an API key.

deepseek.name: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: DeepSeek coding models. Requires an API key.

ollama.name: Ollama (Local)
ollama.description: Run models locally with Ollama. No API key needed.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: Your API key will be stored securely and never shared.

agents.title: Execution Agents
agents.description: Plan Cascade can use multiple AI agents for different tasks. Here are the pre-configured agents.
agents.hint: You can add, remove, or configure agents later in Settings.

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Plan Cascade is configured and ready to use. You can always adjust these settings later by clicking the gear icon in the header.
